so do you know of a way to just to make the .iso file from the actual CD?
yes, wait a mo while I peek in my shell script
first, run isoinfo -d -i /dev/cdrom and note down the number where it says 'volume size is: nnnnnnn'
then run dd if=/dev/cdrom bs=2048 count=<nnnnnnn> conv=notrunc > mycd.iso
